description: Project-specific commands for Project Management Automation MCP Server development

commands.name: install:dev
commands.description: Install package in editable mode for development (uses uv)

commands.name: install:dev-full
commands.description: Install package with all dev dependencies (uses uv)

commands.name: test:run
commands.description: Run all tests with pytest (uses uv)

commands.name: test:watch
commands.description: Run tests in watch mode (uses uv)

commands.name: lint:run
commands.description: Run all linters (black, mypy, ruff) using uv
commands.command: uv run black . --check && uv run mypy . && uv run ruff check .

commands.name: lint:fix
commands.command: uv run black . && uv run ruff check . --fix

commands.name: format:code
commands.description: Format code with black using uv

commands.name: typecheck
commands.description: Run type checking with mypy using uv

commands.name: server:test
commands.description: Test MCP server locally using uv

commands.name: build:install-local
commands.description: Build and install locally using helper script

commands.name: docs:check
commands.description: Check documentation for broken links and issues
